title: Exploring Science Together
alt_text: Four young women intensely studying a scientific experiment displayed under a clear case illuminated by a bright light in a dark room, showing curiosity and concentration.

title: Casual Learning at the Lounge
alt_text: A group of people sitting and lying on colorful bean bags in a relaxed lounge setting, attentively watching a presentation being given by speakers in red shirts at a casual educational event.

title: Virtual Reality Family Experience
alt_text: A young boy and an adult woman wearing VR headsets, guided by a young male instructor, exploring virtual reality content in an outdoor setting surrounded by other attendees and exhibits.

title: Interactive Bubble Science
alt_text: An enthusiastic elderly woman demonstrating bubble science to captivated children in an outdoor workshop, engaging them with a large bubble wand.

title: Youth Science Workshop
alt_text: A group of children focused on assembling and discussing science projects outdoors, guided by a man wearing a patterned shirt, in a collaborative learning environment.

title: Community Learning Session
alt_text: A crowded tent filled with diverse individuals of all ages sitting on chairs, engaged in a community meeting or educational session, with some people standing and facilitating the event.

title: Creative Child at Play
alt_text: A young girl holding up a large, handmade eyeball mask at an outdoor festival, with other children and adults around her engaging in creative activities.

title: Science Demonstration in Action
alt_text: Two women conducting a science demonstration involving a smoke machine and blue equipment, observed by an intrigued audience in an outdoor event booth.

title: Interactive Balloon Play Area
alt_text: A vibrant scene of children and adults sitting and playing with colorful balloons in a festive, tented area during a community event, creating a playful and joyful atmosphere.

title: Scientific Presentation at a Festival
alt_text: People seated in a semi-darkened tent watching a scientific demonstration on a stage, with presenters in casual attire engaging the audience in an educational experience at a festival.

title: Children Exploring Cosmic Rays
alt_text: Children looking at cosmic rays in a cloud chamber with a flashlight at the Womad festival.

title: Interactive Science at Womad Festival
alt_text: Kids and adults observing cosmic rays in a cloud chamber illuminated by a flashlight at the Womad festival.

title: Girl Soldering
alt_text: A girl wearing safety goggles is soldering electronic components on a board at a table.

title: Audience Enjoying Science Presentation
alt_text: A group of people, some in costumes, are laughing and enjoying a science presentation.

title: Physics Presentation
alt_text: A man in a black jacket with outstretched arms is giving a presentation on physics at a podium with a banner behind him.

title: Science Pavilion Interior
alt_text: The interior of the Science Pavilion with banners, a red armchair, plants, and inflatable seating.

title: Line Outside Science Pavilion
alt_text: A line of people waiting outside the Science Pavilion tent at an outdoor event.

title: Big Bang Stage Group Photo
alt_text: A group of people jumping in front of the Big Bang Stage banner.

title: Workshop Activity
alt_text: People working on projects and engaging in activities inside a workshop tent.

title: Outdoor Science Booth
alt_text: People gathered around an outdoor science booth with a banner and equipment.

title: Entrance to Science Pavilion
alt_text: People gathered outside a tent with a sign reading 'Science Pavilion'. A sign on a table reads 'Make Your Own Climate Bracelet'.

title: Night Event at Science Pavilion
alt_text: A group of people standing under a circular, illuminated structure at night with colorful lights and trees in the background.

title: Science Talk
alt_text: Two men seated on colorful chairs on a stage having a discussion. A large sign in the background reads 'Bridges Not Walls'.

title: Film Screening
alt_text: A crowd of people seated inside a tent watching a film on a large screen.

title: Science Presentation
alt_text: A large audience seated in a dark room watching a presentation or lecture.

title: Theremin Workshop
alt_text: A group of people on stage learning to play the theremin, with a projection screen in the background displaying instructions.

title: Interactive Science Activity
alt_text: A group of people, including many children, participating in various science activities inside a tent.

title: Tesla Coil at Science Pavilion
alt_text: A sign reading 'Science Pavilion' with bright lights and a Tesla coil producing a lightning bolt above it.
